text: Francis Patrick Denis "Dapper Dan" Daley (August 28, 1908 â€“ October 15, 1968) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player who played for the Detroit Cougars in the National Hockey League (NHL). ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1968 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Detroit Cougars players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:Ice hockey centres
